highAlarm.title: High alarm
highAlarm.description: Equals to true if the threshold is exceeded

lowAlarm.title: Low alarm
lowAlarm.description: Equals to true if the threshold has fallen below

doorAlarm.title: Door alarm
doorAlarm.description: Equals to true if there is a door alarm

tamperAlarm.title: Tamper alarm
tamperAlarm.description: Equals to true if the strip has been tampered with

floodAlarm.title: Flood alarm
floodAlarm.description: Equals to true if a flood is detected

foilAlarm.title: Foil alarm
foilAlarm.description: Equals to true if a foil is detected

userSwitchAlarm.title: User switch alarm
userSwitchAlarm.description: Equals to true if a user switch is detected

closeProximityAlarm.title: Close proximity Alarm
closeProximityAlarm.description: Equals to true if an object in close proximity is detected
